description: This file defines a Java class named UtilityPaymentResponse in the package com.javatodev.finance.model.dto.response. It models the response object for utility payment operations, including message and transactionId fields. The class uses Lombok annotations to generate boilerplate code such as getters, setters, and builder pattern methods.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing the response for a utility payment, including a message and a transaction ID.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Getter for the message field (generated by Lombok).

methods.name: setMessage
methods.description: Setter for the message field (generated by Lombok).

methods.name: getTransactionId
methods.description: Getter for the transactionId field (generated by Lombok).

methods.name: setTransactionId
methods.description: Setter for the transactionId field (generated by Lombok).
